description:
What is it: Adds Azure AD URL for Kerberos ticket forwarding to the browser's Intranet zone. 
 Simeon Notes: Improves your users’ browser experience by auto logging into sites on the local intranet. To add or remove sites update the config variable ‘AllowSiteToZoneAssignmentList’. 
 Learn More: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/182569/internet-explorer-security-zones-registry-entries-for-advanced-users
